page.title: 15ENTERTAINMENT & RECREATION 2
page.content: Most entertainment partaken by the people of Bellerby requires them to travel varying distances. Many children belong to Guides or Scouts in Leyburn. They travel to Richmond swimming baths once a week on hired transport and hold regular weekend camps in various places in the dale. Theatre goers can enjoy plays put on by the Amateur Dramatic Society in Leyburn, but for a performance by professionals, journeys to Darlington, Harrogate or Newcastle are required. The nearest cinema is in Northallerton 17 miles away. Eating out is a popular form of recreation for many people and the dales villages have a growing number of excellent restaurants, well supported by local people as well as tourists.
